overview: Two storytellers put forth their versions of the story of Shravan Kumar. The art for the film uses painted images from a wooden portable shrine called a Kaavad. The film is a collaborative work between traditional Kaavad storytellers and Kaavad artists from Rajasthan, together with the filmmaker.  Combining lush animation with live-action, the film is an interpretation of two stories which are forever fused in the act of telling and retelling.
title: It's The Same Story
